contest-event.event-date:
June 22, 1895 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Prizes: £25, £20, £13, £6, £3 £1 for the band wearing the neatest uniform or costume: Haslingden Temperance Band. Quick Step Contest: lst, £2, West Hartlepool Operatic, who played the march "Albion" ; 2nd, Besses o' th' Barn, who played the march "Palmer House." 7 bands competed
Jan. 3, 2012, 9:31 a.m. Dec. 6, 2019, 1:20 p.m.
1 Kingston Mills Band John Gladney Jnr Faust [Berlioz, unknown arranger]
2 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen Rossini's Works
3 Trawden Brass Alexander Owen Beethoven's Works [arr. Owen]
4 Batley Old John Gladney Jnr Beethoven's Works [arr. Swift]
5 West Hartlepool Old Alexander Owen Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
Unknown Result Sowerby Bridge Subscription William Heap Beethoven's Works [arr. Owen]
Unknown Result Haslingden Borough Band Fred Durham Schubert (unknown arranger)
